title: TypeCon 2014 - Hotel? Couch?
content:
Looking for a place to stay in DC, preferably from Tuesday the 29th thru Sunday the 3rd. I'm a student, light traveler, and Couchsurfing friendly. My budget's not high, so couchsurfing is preferred, but I might be able to split a hotel room for a few days if necessary.

Here's my couchsurfing profile, if you'd more info about me: [https://www.couchsurfing.org/profile.html?id=YJQ60P5](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114604/https:/www.couchsurfing.org/profile.html?id=YJQ60P5 "https://www.couchsurfing.org/profile.html?id=YJQ60P5")
author: mattmartini

comments.content:
My arrangement is mildly convoluted, but see if you might fit in:  
I've reserved a room at the Hyatt for the night of the 31st, followed by three nights at the Liaison which is _right_ across the street. Long story why it ended up that way. Anyway if you chip in $75 per night for whichever of those four nights you'd like, I'm game. It's not cheap like couchsurfing, but the comfort and convenience of being _right there_ is hard to overstate.

hhp

Thanks for the offer! Looks like I've found a couch to stay on already, so I should be ok, but if something comes up, I'll let you know

Matt

No biggie. See you there!

hhp
